item.title: (tut)bank chest in c wars banana picking examine center sign and more!
item.dc:creator: @motherload11 motherload11
item.description:
@motherload11 wrote:

yeah this is for adding: banana picking examine center sign,tea stall in varrock (gives a whip lol) and bank booth in C wars!

find this in: client.java

if ((objectID == 1746) || (objectID == 1740) || (objectID == 1749)) { heightLevel -= 1; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; }
under that add this:

[code]/*
xxx start RS2 objects
xxx
*/
if (objectID == 2371 && (objectX == 3335) && (objectY == 3348)) //sign to the exame centre
{
sendMessage(“east to the exam centre”);
}
if (objectID == 635 && (objectX == 3269) && (objectY == 3410) && playerLevel[17] >= 95) //tea stall in varrock that gives a whip
{
addItem(4151, 1);

				actionTimer = 15;
            }

if (objectID == 2037 && (objectX == 2918) && (objectY == 3155)) //sign to the exame centre
{
sendMessage(“you pick a banana”);
addItem(1963,1);
}
else if (objectID == 2213)
{
openUpBank();
}
/*[/code]
Save compile run! hope this helps

[move]MoThErLoAd OwNs[/move]

Read full topic
